versions.name: CyberArk Privileged Access Security Error v101.0.0
versions.description: Identifies the occurrence of a CyberArk Privileged Access Security (PAS) error level audit event. The event.code correlates to the CyberArk Vault Audit Action Code.
versions.note:
## Triage and analysis

This is a promotion rule for CyberArk error events, which are alertable events per the vendor.
Consult vendor documentation on interpreting specific events.
author: Elastic
false_positives: To tune this rule, add exceptions to exclude any event.code which should not trigger this rule.
versions.setup: The CyberArk Privileged Access Security (PAS) Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
